summary: Around 200,000 servicemembers leave the military each year and may encounter difficulties during their transition to civilian life. We looked at how DOD's Transition Assistance Program is administered to servicemembers at small or remote military installations in the U.S. We found that all required components of this program (such as counselling and training) are standard across military installations, regardless of their location or size. However...
title: Military Personnel: DOD's Transition Assistance Program at Small or Remote Installations
